p:
The same procedure as in Example 3 was carried out, except that the compound (500 mg) synthesized in Example 2 and the compound (867 mg) synthesized in Example 8 were used, the title compound (924 mg) having the following physical properties was obtained.
TLC: Rf 0.43 (dichloromethane : methanol: 28% ammonia water = 90 : 10 : 1); NMR(CDCl 3): δ 0.71(s, 3H), 1.17(s, 3H), 1.62(m, 2H), 1.82(m, 2H), 2.29(s, 3H), 2.85(s, 6H), 3.39(m, 2H), 3.58(m, 2H), 3.76(s, 2H), 3.85(s, 2H), 4.01(t, J = 7.5 Hz, 1H), 4.40(t, J = 5.4 Hz, 1H), 6.87(d, J = 1.8 Hz, 1H), 6.91(d, J = 1.8 Hz, 1H), 7.01(d, J = 1.8 Hz, 1H), 7.23(d, J = 1.8 Hz, 1H).
